pullRequest.title: Fix shaky code coverage
pullRequest.bodyText:
Now testing both variants with open and closed projects
Additionally externalized method to check for correct project nature.
Method will be needed in server as well.


Closes #551: Shaky code coverage in VirSatProjectCommons

commit.message:
